translation.en: Every crime has a set of elements, things the government has to prove in order to establish that you're guilty of the crime.
translation.ja: 有罪と認定するには いくつかの条件があります

translation.en: It can be something as simple as you're charged with drunk driving. They need to prove that you were driving on a public street.
translation.ja: 飲酒運転なら 公道を走った証拠が必要です

translation.en: You know, a guy takes a golf cart and drives around the golf course.
translation.ja: ゴルフ場内を カートで走ったら？

translation.en: Is that a public street or not?
translation.ja: 公道でしょうか？

translation.en: So things that seem like silly details in a case actually become important.
translation.ja: ささいな点が重要なんです

translation.en: In a drug case, if you are prosecuted and charged with selling a joint,
translation.ja: ジョイントを販売した容疑で 起訴するなら

translation.en: the question is, is that really marijuana?
translation.ja: 大事なのは中身の物質

translation.en: If it's not, you're not guilty.
translation.ja: 中身がカギです

translation.en: The government has to prove, and prove beyond a reasonable doubt, that the thing they're accusing you of doing,
translation.ja: 合理的な疑いを 差し挟む余地のない程度に

translation.en: which is against the law, you've actually done.
translation.ja: 立証が必要なんです

translation.en: This nation faces a major crisis in terms of the increasing use of drugs.
translation.ja: 我が国では 違法薬物の使用者が増加

translation.en: We have the laws now. We're going to go out and enforce those laws.
translation.ja: 打開するため 法律を施行します

translation.en: Officers now do not need a search warrant to enter a home suspected of containing illegal drugs.
translation.ja: 違法薬物の捜索に もう令状は要りません

translation.en: This... This is crack cocaine.
translation.ja: これが… クラックコカイン

translation.en: It's as innocent- looking as candy. But it's turning our cities into battle zones.
translation.ja: キャンディーのようですが 災いの元です

translation.en: If you're gonna fight a war on drugs, you need to build an entire system
translation.ja: 薬物と闘うには 体制づくりが必要です

translation.en: designed around finding those people who manufacture, ship, sell and use
translation.ja: 薬物と闘うには 体制づくりが必要です 違法薬物の製造者や密輸入者 販売者 使用者を

translation.en: the drugs you decide are illegal,
translation.ja: 違法薬物の製造者や密輸入者 販売者 使用者を

translation.en: and then a system to prosecute them and imprison them.
translation.ja: 罪に問い 収監するんです

translation.en: There are huge agencies at the local level, the state level, the federal level.
translation.ja: 各自治体に 担当省庁があります

translation.en: It's everything from the police officers to the prosecutors to the court officials
translation.ja: 携わるのは 警官や検察官 裁判所職員 看守に行政官

translation.en: to the prison guards to the administrators to the lab scientists.
translation.ja: 警官や検察官 裁判所職員 看守に行政官 そして研究所員

translation.en: There are billions of dollars that flood into this system
translation.ja: 数十億ドルが 投入されています

translation.en: to perpetuate this war on drugs, which we've now been fighting since the 1970s.
translation.ja: 麻薬戦争は 1970年代から続いています

translation.en: In order to convict someone because of some substances that we've decided are illegal, you need a scientist
translation.ja: 有罪判決を下すには 科学者が必要です

translation.en: to look at that substance and say, Yes, this is cocaine, or This is heroin, or This is marijuana, or not.
translation.ja: 違法薬物かどうか 判別するためです

translation.en: Certain substances form a distinctive crystal.
translation.ja: 結晶を形成する物質が あります

translation.en: This is the crystal for heroin.
translation.ja: ヘロインですね

translation.en: Here's the crystal for cocaine.
translation.ja: これはコカイン

translation.en: And that's an essential part of the case, because if the government can't prove that, then they can't convict anyone.
translation.ja: 有罪の認定には 薬物の分析が不可欠です

translation.en: So, when you get the evidence to your bench, you will do a preliminary description of the evidence.
translation.ja: 証拠品を作業台(ベンチ)で受け取ると まず照合を行います

translation.en: You want to verify chain of custody,
translation.ja: 証拠保全ですね

translation.en: uh, just making sure that all the dates and times
translation.ja: 証拠保全ですね 書類や証拠品を見ながら

translation.en: and signatures and numbers match up
translation.ja: 書類や証拠品を見ながら 日時や数量が正しいか 確認するんです

translation.en: as you, uh, look at the various paperwork and items.
translation.ja: 日時や数量が正しいか 確認するんです

translation.en: You move on to take a weight, the net weight, which is the weight of the drug material only.
translation.ja: それから 薬物だけの重量を測定します

translation.en: And then we will go through a series of tests.
translation.ja: 検査は その後です

translation.en: At that point, we would do a spot color test.
translation.ja: まず行うのは色による検査

translation.en: Basically, we put a very small amount of different reagents in some wells
translation.ja: セラミック容器の くぼみに 異なる試薬を 数滴ずつ垂らします

translation.en: in a ceramic plate, a drop or two of each,
translation.ja: 異なる試薬を 数滴ずつ垂らします

translation.en: and certain substances cause certain color changes with their agents.
translation.ja: 薬物によっては 色が変化するんです

translation.en: With other substances, we would add some of the sample to a vial
translation.ja: コカイン 色の変わらない物質は 色の変わらない物質は

translation.en: and seal it to be run on the mass spectrometer.
translation.ja: 質量分析計にかけます

translation.en: The mass spectrometer blasts ions at the chemical,
translation.ja: 質量分析計を使えば

translation.en: which breaks the chemical into kind of like a chemical fingerprint.
translation.ja: 物質の特徴が はっきり分かります

translation.en: And so we can compare that fingerprint to the fingerprint of standards or controls.
translation.ja: その特徴を見本と比較します

translation.en: When we're done,
translation.ja: 〝薬物指紋〞 終わったら サンプルは新しい証拠品袋へ

translation.en: we put it into a brand- new evidence bag,
translation.ja: 終わったら サンプルは新しい証拠品袋へ

translation.en: and we would initial and heat- seal it closed.
translation.ja: 署名して溶封します

translation.en: At that point, we would verify that the results on the certificate matched our results in the notebook
translation.ja: 鑑定書とノートの記録が 合っているのを確認し

translation.en: and we would sign the certificates.
translation.ja: 鑑定書に署名します

translation.en: A drug certificate is the scientific record
translation.ja: 鑑定書は 科学的な記録です

translation.en: that some independent scientist
translation.ja: 独立した科学者が

translation.en: looked under a microscope or in a spectrometer or used some other technology to determine,
translation.ja: 顕微鏡や分光計で 調べた結果なんです

translation.en: yes, in fact, what you had,

translation.en: of drug seizures across all of Western Massachusetts.

translation.en: Not only were they out in the western part of the state,
translation.ja: ノーサンプトン アマースト ホールヨーク スプリングフィールド 地理的に中心部から 外れていただけでなく 地理的に中心部から 外れていただけでなく

translation.ja: マサチューセッツ州西部の 人々は

translation.ja: 大ごとに したくないようでした

translation.en: Your job isn't to contain it. It's to figure out what's the truth and how are we gonna do justice?
